mapper.select: SELECT u.account, u.nickname, u.id, msg.id as messageId, msg.content as content, msg.create_time as createTime, chat.id AS chatId, msg.receiver_uid as receiverUid, msg.send_uid as sendUid, send.nickname AS sendNickname, receiver.nickname AS receiverNickname FROM cc_user u JOIN cc_chat chat ON (chat.send_uid = u.user_id OR chat.receiver_uid = u.user_id) LEFT JOIN cc_message msg ON chat.id = msg.chat_id LEFT JOIN cc_user send ON chat.send_uid = send.user_id LEFT JOIN cc_user receiver ON chat.receiver_uid = receiver.user_id WHERE u.user_id = ${uid};
mapper.update: UPDATE cc_chat SET last_message_id = ( SELECT subquery.latest_message_id FROM ( SELECT cc_chat.id, cc_message.id AS latest_message_id FROM cc_chat LEFT JOIN cc_message ON cc_chat.id = cc_message.chat_id ORDER BY cc_message.create_time DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS subquery WHERE cc_chat.id = subquery.id ) where cc_chat.id = ${chatId};
